name: Oscilla Rocketfire
description: Oscilla Rocketfire is an agile and charismatic oscilloscope-themed robot from the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and classic buttons, Oscilla Rocketfire is equipped with rocket-powered arms and legs, allowing it to move swiftly and gracefully. Its screen emits a laser display, showcasing its advanced intelligence and technical capabilities. Oscilla Rocketfire is a remarkable fusion of style and functionality, making it a standout member of the WebtrES club.
